column4: i realy try avoiding spaming irc rooms and forums ffor issues but whoever has a slight hint on why hardy is giving me high iowait, making my system uncomfortably slow..
whoever knows what may be causing high iowait in hardy pls msg me...
I did some looking into iowait issues a few weeks ago and I don't think it's actually a problem
If I understand correctly, iowait is really just idle time as far as the CPU is concerned
